That story post about the island I did last night was really, really poorly 
done and lame. Im going to pick it up from the point to where they found the 
Radio and listened to it...........

    Aerostreak, in his black and brown beast mode where his large wings were 
tucked behinde him making it look like a backpack, held the radio and 
examined it in the sunlight. His red eyes looked over it, scrutinizeing it, 
obsorbing every detail. He looked to see that the symbol on the radio was the 
same on his left breast. That was an important find, very important.
    In his won hut, his own private place, he tucked it away under his 
mattress of palmleaves. His bed was more like a nest because all the natives 
slept in beast mode. When it was hidden from view he made his way out of the 
hut into the center of camp where a fire pit was, along with logs to sit 
around it. He came to find Nighteyes and Guanatix there. They were talking 
about the weather while Grappler and Paddletail were finishing the final 
phase of Great Hall.
    He continued past his to talkitive sisters, and two working brothers to 
find Aquarious, the Dolphin, heading for the beach. Without water he would 
die, hence that was why he didnt have a hut. Instead he slept in an 
underwater cave beneath the island.
    Aquarious locked his baby blue eyes on Aerostreak. "Hello! Where are you 
headed to this morning?" The dolphin said egarly.
    Aerostreak gave a sort of sneer. He saw that Aquarious' symbol was 
different than his. The dolphins was red, while Aerostreaks was purple with 
an insect like head.
    "Im investigating something. You wouldnt understand, go to the beach." He 
commanded his brother. Aquarious wasnt bright, and often listened to 
Aerostreak who was quite smart and very dominating.
    Aquarious looked a little sadened by that command. "Alright, but I sure 
would like to help."
    "No. Now go! I have no time for this useless conversation." Aerostreak 
said and left. He made his way into the jungle, on the path, and went deeper. 
He went so far to where the light no longer showed. He came to rest on a 
fallen tree, and waited.

    Grappler, in his red Tarantula beast mode scurried into the jungle, on 
the trail of Aerostreak. The spider smelt him and was following him. If 
anything he could get a meal out of this excurtion.
    Now he watched as the bird to a seat on a fallen tree. Through the cover 
of sone ferns he watched Aerostreak. Soon, it became boreing to watch him 
there so he emerged.
    "What are you doing here?" Aerostreak demanded.
    The spider hissed back, "Following you. Why did you come all the way out 
here?"
    Aerostreak looked and saw he had the same symbol has him on his chest, 
and that sparked a revelation within his hidden, long lost Predacon soul.
